resources.string: No Drafts found, start a new one in your favorite reddit app or reddit.com and they will show up here
Draft King requires access to your Reddit account in order to fetch drafts and allow you to schedule when they should be posted
Battery Optimization may caused scheduled Submissions to fail to post. Consider turning off Battery Optimization for this app in Settings.
Scheduled Submission is trying to post too early, this may have been caused by an older Alarm that was set for this Submission before it was updated.
